meanings.sent1: In bright light, myosis helps protect the eye.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use a light to check for myosis in patients.
meanings.sent3: The tiny flashlight caused myosis, making the eye look funny.
meanings.sent4: Her focus was so intense, it felt like a myosis of attention.
meanings.sent5: The myosis of the pupil was like a camera lens closing in a bright room.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by excessive contraction of the pupil.
meanings.sent1: Myosis can sometimes be a sign of certain health issues.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with myosis after the eye exam.
meanings.sent3: His myosis was so extreme, he could barely see in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The myosis of fear in her eyes was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The myosis of the pupil was a clear indicator of her nervousness.
